column5: News mentioned that there is a bit of a shortage of fuel for some stations. Today in Barrie I noticed that 2 Shell's had 0.00 on their signs.
Stopped in on the Queensway on the way home from work and got esso 93+ for 108.8 because they were out of regular, good deal!
Hmm.. I had heard a rumor of fuel shortages but this is the first confirmation of it.. maybe I need to get all of my cans filled??....
